text: Amiran Amirkhanov (born February 27, 1986) is an Armenian professional basketball player, currently playing for BC Urartu. He represented Armenia's national basketball team at the 2016 FIBA European Championship for Small Countries in Ciorescu, Moldova, where he was his team's best passer and the third-best passer of the tournament.Armenia accumulated statistics | 2016 FIBA European Championship for Small Countries, ARCHIVE.FIBA.com, accessed 27 Dec 2016. ==References== ==External links== * FIBA profile * EuroLeague profile * Eurobasket.com profile Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Point guards Category:Armenian men's basketball players Category:Armenian people of Russian descent
title: Amiran Amirkhanov
